title: Utilizing Multi-Relational Graph Neural Networks for Knowledge Graph Completion

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Graph Theory and Machine Learning Concepts, Programming Experience (Python Recommended)
context.additional_context: A course for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields to learn knowledge graph completion techniques for systematizing work-related knowledge.

learning_goals: Learners will be able to explain the basic structure of knowledge graphs and the necessity of Knowledge Graph Completion (KGC).
Learners will be able to analyze the limitations of GCN-based models and understand the operational principles of multi-relational graph neural networks (CorIn).
Learners will be able to implement knowledge graph completion models applicable to real-world domains (medical/legal/technical).
Learners will be able to visualize and evaluate knowledge graph completion results in project form.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
